summary: We engineer the biosynthetic pathways of microbes in order to synthesize commercially valuable molecules. Our team uses a cloud-based platform, big data and sophisticated bioinformatics pipelines to recommend and learn from strain edits.

Operating manager for Integrated Biology software solutions.
Project manager for [Mass Profiler Professional](https://www.agilent.com/en/product/software-informatics/mass-spectrometry-software/data-analysis/mass-profiler-professional-software), [MassHunter Profinder](https://www.agilent.com/en/video/profinder-demo), MassHunter ID Browser and related tools.
* 2018: Released [MassHunter Classifier 1.0](https://www.agilent.com/cs/library/technicaloverviews/public/technical-overview-masshunter-classifier-5994-1890en-agilent.pdf) - a machine learning based tool for detection of food fraud using high-resolution mass spectrometry.
Also released [Lipid Annotator 1.0](https://www.agilent.com/cs/library/technicaloverviews/public/technicaloverview-lipidomics-lipid-annotator-5994-1111en-agilent.pdf) - a fit-for-purpose lipidomics annotation tool.
* 2016: Released [VistaFlux 1.0](https://www.agilent.com/en/product/software-informatics/mass-spectrometry-software/data-analysis/vistaflux-software) - a software solution for stable label metabolic tracer analysis using high-resolution LC/Q-TOF mass spectrometry.
* 2014: Released [Mass Profiler Professional 13.0](https://www.agilent.com/en/product/software-informatics/mass-spectrometry-software/data-analysis/mass-profiler-professional-software) - a chemometric profiling application aimed at integrated biology analysis across multiple 'omics.

Cross-functional R&D leader of Integrated Biology software solutions. R&D point of contact for academic, government and industry collaborators in metabolomics.
* 2013: Released [MassHunter Profinder](https://www.agilent.com/en/video/profinder-demo) - a batch feature extraction tool for LC/MS chemometric data analysis. [Press release](http://www.agilent.com/about/newsroom/presrel/2013/16dec-ca13090.html)

C# .NET developer for MassHunter family of mass spectrometry data acquisition and data analysis software packages.
* 2012: Successfully utilized Scrum to project manage the development of two chemometric software packages for high-resolution mass spectrometry.
* 2011: Architected statistical profiling software capable of integrating biological data from multiple instrument sources (microarrays, NGS, mass spectrometers).
* 2010: Improved real-time acquisition algorithms for Q-TOF mass spectrometers, thereby doubling performance in protein ID applications. My work was a mix of bench chemistry, data acquisition, data mining and novel algorithm development in firmware.
* 2009: Released a chemometrics package for mass spectrometric data analysis, with a particular emphasis in proteomics and metabolomics data.
* 2008: Evolved feature extraction algorithms for use in qualitative data analysis software.
Windows MFC C++ developer for Ciphergen ProteinChip and Biomarker Wizard softwares.
